channel.title: redis on jdhao's digital home
channel.description: Recent content in redis on jdhao's digital home

item.title: Delete Keys Matching A Pattern with py-redis-cluster
item.description: We have a Python web service where we store some key-val pairs in redis. Occasionally, I want to delete some of the keys matching a certain pattern. Current, we are using redis-py-cluster for redis-related operations.
